## scopedChildren variable

Helper function for `walk()`<!-- -->. Returns child nodes for any control flow nodes containing a child scope.

 allChildren

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scopedChildren: (t: Term<any>) => Term<any>[] | undefined
```
